made_with_halal_ingredients: MADE WITH THE HALAL ONLY INGREDIENTS
ceo_message: Our main philosophy is to carefully evaluate the wishes of our buyers and to produce the highest quality products that meet those expectations. The main indicators of our quality are the Halal Guarantee provided by the Caucasian Muslim Board, as well as international ISO and ICRIC (Halal) certificates.
our_mission_text: Operates as the manufacturer of high-quality and healthy meat & dairy products, and pioneers innovation and consumer awareness.
our_vision_text: Operates as an international food processing company, setting the standard for taste, quality, and innovation in the industry.
location: Azerbaijan, Khirdalan city, Academic Hasan Aliyev street 38
meat_processing_description: We proudly offer our high-quality meat products through 524 sales points across the region. Each location ensures that you receive the freshest and finest meats, delivered with exceptional service.

labaratoryAnalysisAccordion.title: Analysis of sausage products
labaratoryAnalysisAccordion.description:
1. 1. Determination of organoleptic indicators (smell, taste, color, consistency);
  2. 2. Determination of moisture;
  3. 3. Determination of nitrite;
  4. 4. Determination of sodium chloride;
  5. 5. Determination of starch;
  6. 6. Determination of microbiological indicators:
  7. 7. Determination of mesophilic-aerobic and facultative anaerobic microorganisms (CFU 1 g);
  8. 8. Determination of coliform bacteria (coliforms);
  9. 9. Determination of pathogenic microorganisms, including salmonella;
  10. 10. Determination of sulfite-reducing Clostridia;
  11. 11. Determination of staphylococci;

labaratoryAnalysisAccordion.title: Analysis of raw materials used: (Dried milk, starch, wheat flour).
labaratoryAnalysisAccordion.description:
1. Dried milk, starch, wheat flour.

2. Organoleptic indicators (smell, taste, color, consistency);

3. Acidity;

4. Solubility;

5. Determination of moisture and dry matter content;

labaratoryAnalysisAccordion.title: Analysis of dairy products
labaratoryAnalysisAccordion.description:
1. Determination of organoleptic indicators (smell, taste, color, consistency);

2. Determination of acidity;

3. Determination of density;

4. Determination of fat content;

5. Determination of moisture and dry matter content;

6. Determination of sodium chloride;

7. Determination of sugar;

8. Determination of microbiological indicators;

9. Determination of coliform bacteria (coliforms);

10. Determination of pathogenic microorganisms, including salmonella;

11. Determination of staphylococci;

labaratoryAnalysisAccordion.title: Drinking water analysis
labaratoryAnalysisAccordion.description:
1. Organoleptic indicators (smell, taste, color);

2. Determination of pH;

3. Determination of hardness;

4. Determination of chlorides;

5. Determination of alkalinity;

6. Determination of calcium;

7. Determination of magnesium;

8. Determination of bicarbonates;

9. Determination of ammonium salts;

10. Determination of nitrite;

11. Determination of iron;

12. Determination of microbiological indicators:

13. Total microbial count at 37°C;

14. Determination of total coliform bacteria;
